name: Aquamariner
description:
Your hometown has suffered catastrophic damage in the wake of a violent storm. Many essential services are out of commission and even the bay entrance has been blocked. It is up to you, our local hero, to come to the aid of the people and rebuild the town's infrastructure. How will you do it? Well, by fishing of course.

Cast your Line


Find & catch over 50 different species of fish, each with their own habitat & behaviours. Use bait & place lobster pots to find even more species. Explore multiple biomes around your home as you fill out your fishipedia.


Repair your home


With the profits from your catch, rebuild the town & restore life into it. As shops & services re-open, you’ll be able to upgrade & customise your boat & gear, allowing you to bring in even more lucrative catches.


Race your heart out


It's not just about how many fish you can catch. Some sailors like to test their skills in races around the bay. Are you brave enough to compete and collect the spoils?


Clean up the Sea


The aftermath of the storm has filled the sea with debris. Collect any salvage you can find & bring it back to port. You never know what rewards you will get for doing so.
